attributes.action: Full Investigation into the Administration and Purchase of Leeds United
attributes.additional_details: We would like a full investigation into the Administration and Purchase of Leeds United by Ken Bates.  Many are unhappy that the whole process has been done in such a secretive way, using offshore companies etc.  The Leeds Fans would like the government to investigate the matter and confirm that the process was clean and honest.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Football Association.
